legalPage.metaDescription: Read the legal notice and privacy policy of Delta Quest.
legalPage.title: Legal Notice and Privacy Policy
legalPage.termsText:
This website is operated by Delta Quest Corporation (hereinafter referred to as "the Company").
By using this site, you agree to the following terms of use.
legalPage.disclaimerText: We strive to ensure the accuracy and timeliness of the information, but we cannot be held responsible for errors or omissions.
legalPage.copyrightText: All content on this site (texts, images, design, programs, etc.) is the property of Delta Quest unless otherwise stated. Any reproduction is prohibited.
legalPage.privacyText: We handle your personal data in accordance with this privacy policy.
legalPage.infoCollectedText: We collect your personal data for:
legalPage.infoCollectedList: Using the contact form|Analyzing to improve services|Other communications with you
legalPage.dataProtectionText: We will not provide or disclose your personal information to third parties, except when required by law or requested by a public institution.
legalPage.contactText: For any questions regarding the legal notice or privacy policy, contact us:
